Events that occurred on 10 July.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Alan White.
1990 - George Allen and Unwin is bought by HarperCollins.
2003 - Tolkien Thing V in Westerwald, Germany.
2004 - German translator Hans J. Sch√ºtz dies.
2008 - Tolkien Thing X in Rieneck, Germany.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is imprisoned by Saruman.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
